page.title: 09 FARMING
page.content: There are 5 farms in our area .They are Twelve Acre Farm,Pink Hill Farm,College Farm,Foxley Farm and Litchfield Farm.They are mainly mixed farms with a few sheep.The main crops are Barley,Wheat and Grass for Silage. The soil is mostly heavy and the ground is mainly Clay.The land is mainly rolling.The fields are not hard to drain.The makes of equipment are mostly Ford,Claas and New Holland for Harvest Combines.Twelve Acre Farm is the biggest at 594 Acres,followed by Foxley Farm at about 59 Acres.The rest of the Farms are small by comparison.Twelve Acre Farm grows mainly Wheat,Barley and Grass and they have an Intensive Beef System which means they breed Calfs from a few weeks old to about 18 months old,then they go to the slaughter house
